```
{'repo_name': 'sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes', 'source_branch': 'feat/add-sheepvibes-rules-microagent', 'target_branch': 'main', 'title': 'feat: add SheepVibes rules microagent', 'body': "## Description
This PR adds a microagent documentation file that captures the repository's rules, workflows, and development guidelines for AI agents.

## Changes
- Created `.openhands/microagents/sheepvibes-rules.md`
- Documents mandatory workflow steps for AI agents
- Provides testing requirements and CI/CD procedures
- Includes application architecture overview and development setup instructions

## Purpose
The microagent provides comprehensive knowledge about:
- Mandatory agent workflow steps (read all .md files, test validation, CI replication)
- Testing procedures with Redis service requirements
- Development environment setup for both containerized and direct development
- Error handling guidelines and limitations

## Testing
- [x] Microagent file created successfully
- [x] Branch created and pushed to remote
- Follows repository rules documented in AGENTS.md

## Related Issues
N/A - New feature to improve agent documentation and workflow clarity"}
```
